citations.narrative:
The registrant has not notified USDA Animal Care of changes in operation affecting his status as a carrier. The inspector
attempted to conduct a complaint inspection at the current address on record with USDA Animal Care. The person
answering the door stated that she was unfamiliar with the name of the registrant and that no one by the registrant's name
was currently at that address. The registrant was not reachable via the information on record (multiple phone calls went to
a full voicemail box, text was not answered and an email message requesting a return phone call was not honored). A
registrant must notify Animal Care in a timely manner of any change in name, address, ownership or any other change in
operations within 10 days of making such change in order to allow Animal Care to follow up with issues pertaining to the
Animal Welfare Act and Regulations. The registrant shall notify USDA Animal Care by certified mail of any change in
address or other change in operations. Correct by 10/3/23.
This inspection and exit interview were attempted to be conducted with the registrant.
n

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
The registrant has not notified USDA Animal Care of changes in operation affecting his status as a carrier. The inspector 
attempted to conduct a complaint inspection at the current address on record with USDA Animal Care. The person 
answering the door stated that she was unfamiliar with the name of the registrant and that no one by the registrant's name 
was currently at that address. The registrant was not reachable via the information on record (multiple phone calls went to 
a full voicemail box, text was not answered and an email message requesting a return phone call was not honored). A 
registrant must notify Animal Care in a timely manner of any change in name, address, ownership or any other change in 
operations within 10 days of making such change in order to allow Animal Care to follow up with issues pertaining to the 
Animal Welfare Act and Regulations. The registrant shall notify USDA Animal Care by certified mail of any change in 
address or other change in operations. Correct by 10/3/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were attempted to be conducted with the registrant.
